bibl.note: Area 4: The Temple Hill. - Area 2.1: The Central Habitation Quarter: completion of the investigation of the house of the rhetor Serenos and its adjoining school, built on top of a large public bath complex.

bibl.seg: Paola Davoli, Amheida 2007-2009: New Results from the Excavations.
